title: Workshop on Peer Learning-Based Mathematics Project Design and Management

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: In-service secondary mathematics teachers collaborate via smartphones to complete projects

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peer teachers to develop three or more math project topics.
Learners can improve their lesson designs at least twice based on peer feedback during the project process.
Learners can achieve over 85% project completion by distributing responsibilities and fulfilling roles within collaborative learning groups.
Learners can share at least five math teaching methodology ideas through communication with peer teachers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
